summary: Want to create your own weapon Mods? Now you can with This! A Complete PDF Tutorial From Start To End For Creating Weapons For Skyrim. Step by Step Guide with Pictures, Links to Extra Information and Guides for Software. For Beginners to Get From Nothing to Playing Their Own Mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#dd2423][size=5]Complete Tutorial For Beginners[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16985-2-1336920364.jpg[/IMG]

I created this tutorial because there isn\'t a tutorial that takes you from start to finnish with extra information about Skyrim and its specific quirks. 

120 Pages With Pictures Helping Step by Step

[list]
[*] Information About Modeling Programs
[*] Information About Texturing and Sculpting Programs
[*] Information About Nifskope
[*] Information About Creation Kit
[*] 
[*] Information About Texture Formats
[*] Information About Texture Suffixes
[/list]

In this tutorial I will help you create your first weapon from scratch

New Model
New Texture
New ESP

I tried to keep the tutorials as simple as possible for beginners but still giving much of the more technical information needed

[color=#dd2423]If This Tutorial Helps You Please Endorse.

If you have any questions,feel free to message me here on my Nexus Profile, I will reply when I can[/color]

Have Fun Modding and Enjoy

[color=#dd2423][size=5]If you create a Mod Based on information from this tutorial, drop me link to your mod. Always cool to see what other folks Make[/size][/color]

[/center]
author: TheMalfazar

files.name: Version 2
